name: ElectroSwing Beatdown
description:
This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2022 with the theme Duality. 

2 players against each other in an epic dance battle! Both are trying to attract the dancing crowd with their sweet groovy moves. Which one will dominate the other and blast their tune on the dance floor!

Player 1 (on the left) plays with WASD.

Player 2 (on the right) plays with the Arrow keys.

Designers

Sarah Jayne Assmus

Étienne Caya

Charles-Antoine Solis
